## [Antimicrobial Use Metrics](https://lvr-explore.shinyapps.io/ICASA_AMUMetrics_Anonymous/) {#amu-metrics}

This link explores feedlot antimicrobial use accross 8 feedyards using different metrics



## [Therapeutic Outcomes](https://lvr-explore.shinyapps.io/ICASAMorbidityParameters/) {#amu-outcomes}

This report explores the economics associated with interventions given basic disease information early in the feeding period.
